name: AI Resume Generator
description: Document Generation API that uses OpenAI to create an example resume when provided the following data: University Name, Degree, and a list of Skills

api_methods.name: Generate Document: Cover Letter
api_methods.description: Endpoint that will generate a large text response containing a Cover Letter document using the provided information

parameters.name: jobDescription
parameters.default: Example Co. is looking for a Full Stack Web Developer to maintain and improve our custom web application. The solutions will require both frontend and backend skills. Our web application runs on a LEMP stack. LEMP stack experience is a bonus, but not required.

utterances.utterance: Can you create a cover letter for a Full Stack Web Developer position?
Generate a cover letter for a job at Example Co. that requires both frontend and backend skills.

parameters.jobDescription: Example Co. is looking for a Full Stack Web Developer to maintain and improve our custom web application. The solutions will require both frontend and backend skills. Our web application runs on a LEMP stack. LEMP stack experience is a bonus, but not required.

utterances.utterance: I need a cover letter for a Software Engineer role with skills in Networking and Web Development.
Could you draft a cover letter for a Data Analyst position? I graduated with a degree in Information Systems from Michigan State University.
Please generate a cover letter for a Full Stack Developer role. I have experience with the LEMP stack.
I’m applying for a Web Developer position. Can you create a cover letter highlighting my skills in Networking and Web Development?
Draft a cover letter for a Full Stack Web Developer role at Example Co. I graduated with a degree in Computer Science.

parameters.jobDescription: Example Co. is looking for a Full Stack Web Developer to maintain and improve our custom web application. The solutions will require both frontend and backend skills. Our web application runs on a LEMP stack. LEMP stack experience is a bonus, but not required.

utterances.utterance: Can you help me write a cover letter for a Full Stack Developer position? I studied Information Systems at Stanford University.
Generate a cover letter for a Full Stack Web Developer role. I have skills in Networking, Web Development, and the LEMP stack.
I need a cover letter for a Full Stack Developer position at Example Co. I graduated from Michigan State University with a degree in Information Systems.

parameters.jobDescription: Example Co. is looking for a Full Stack Web Developer to maintain and improve our custom web application. The solutions will require both frontend and backend skills. Our web application runs on a LEMP stack. LEMP stack experience is a bonus, but not required.

api_methods.name: Generate Document: Resume
api_methods.description: Endpoint that will generate a large text response containing a Resume document using the provided information

utterances.utterance: Can you create a resume for someone with a degree in Computer Science?
Generate a resume highlighting skills in Python and Data Analysis.
I need a resume for a graduate from Harvard University.
Create a resume for a person with a degree in Electrical Engineering and skills in Circuit Design.
Generate a resume for someone who studied at Stanford University and has skills in Machine Learning.
Can you make a resume for a graduate with a degree in Business Administration from Yale?
I need a resume showcasing skills in Graphic Design and Web Development.
Create a resume for someone with a degree in Psychology.
Generate a resume for a graduate from MIT with skills in Robotics.
Can you create a resume for a person with a degree in Marketing and skills in Digital Advertising?
